basic.description: This course covers the processes of pollutant transport and transformation in and between air, water, and soil or sediments. Topics include advection, dispersion, diffusion, sorption, degradation, and phase-change processes.
basic.subject: ENV
basic.title: Chemical Fate and Transport in the Environment

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CWR 3201, EES 3040, and either MAP 2302 or MAP 3305.
